Destinations Page (Package Properties Dialog Box)

Requires: Application Builder or Professional System (NI Linux Real-Time, Windows)

Use this page of the Package Properties dialog box to configure the destination structure of a package.

This page includes the following components:

  • Destination—Specifies the location and directory structure of the files when you install them from the package.
  • Add destination—Adds a folder to the package directory structure that Destination displays. Use the Destination name option to change the name.
  • Remove destination—Removes the folder from Destination.
  • Destination name—Displays the name of the folder in the package directory structure. You can rename folders you add.
  • Destination information—Specifies information about the selected folder in Destination.
